channel.title: WorldScape - Epic Multiversion 317/508 Server!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i51.tinypic.com/k52z3n.png[/img]
Welcome to WorldScape! WorldScape is ran by [img]http://www.allgofree.org/rs/pics/admin.gif[/img]Ry60003333, [img]http://www.allgofree.org/rs/pics/admin.gif[/img]Kevin, and [img]http://www.allgofree.org/rs/pics/admin.gif[/img]Bill!
[center][size=14pt][b]FIRST[/b] and [b]ONLY[/b] Multi-Version Server![/size] VPS and 24/7![/center]
Features: - 508 HD/LD Downloadable Clients - - 508 HD FullScreen option - - All 474 items, emotes, and gfxs - - Custom minigames - - Player following - - Player trading - - Party room - - Working staking/dueling - - Skill capes - - 100% Player Vs Player combat - - 100% Player Vs NPC combat - - Capable of npc vs npc combat - - Lots of pkers - - Minigame shop containing 474 items - - 100% working woodcutting, firemaking, fishing, mining, runecrafting, prayer, smithing, cooking, farming, soon to be all skills -
This server was not downloaded and then hosted. It was programmed from nothing and built entirely from scratch. That's just how awesome [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=80075]Ry60003333[/url] is.
Play WorldScape here: [url=http://www.worldscapeblitz.com/blitz/custom/?action=wscplay&hidemenus=1&world=1&server=world1.worldscapeblitz.com&port=43594&blitz=1]Web client[/url] Download the client: [url=http://dexsigns.com/allgofree/client/worldscape_client_v5_21.zip]Download here (direct download)[/url] Visit our forums: [url=http://www.worldscapeblitz.com/blitz/smf/index.php]WorldScape Homepage[/url] Our highscores: [url=http://www.worldscapeblitz.com/blitz/custom/?action=highscores]WorldScape highscores[/url]
[img]http://www.allgofree.org/pics/youtube_logo.png[/img] WorldScape Videos [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8jvVwFdGYAg]WorldScape Daxking vs Francis[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FHZ6imYtBPU]WorldScape Camp (Custom Mini-Game)[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ryex4EgyzBw]One Epic Day In WorldScape[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uByTMvgnj6c]Working Dueling/Staking[/url]
[img]http://rainribbon.com/psypets/itemsuggestions/camera-transparent.png[/img] Some In-Game pictures:
[img]http://www.worldscapeblitz.com/blitz/pics/508launch/508and317.png[/img]
[img]http://www.worldscapeblitz.com/blitz/pics/508launch/508and317_2.png[/img]
[img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/9383/screenshot288o.png[/img]
[img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/1471/screenshot290.png[/img]
[img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/5269/screenshot286g.png[/img]
[img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/1640/screenshot269a.png[/img]
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2820/screenshot291v.png[/img]
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/4830/screenshot292a.png[/img]
[img]http://oi55.tinypic.com/2djofs.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8523/ryandying.png[/img]
[img]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l502/dug1993/CHRISTMAS%202011/christmasevent2011p1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l502/dug1993/AD%20PICS/Camp1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l502/dug1993/AD%20PICS/Camp2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l502/dug1993/AD%20PICS/funpk2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://png-3.findicons.com/files/icons/1156/fugue/16/light_bulb_pencil.png[/img]
FAQ:
Q: How long has this server been around? A: It's been around since January 2007.
Q: Who created WorldScape? A: Ry60003333
Q: How often does the server have to restart? A: Hardly ever! This server does not use a "base" server, it was coded 100% by Ry60003333 from scratch! It supports 2,000 players online at one time, without any lag! [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IzXz6hvfhc4]Part 1[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GRhHGFAR5so]Part 2[/url]
Q: How often do updates occur? A: About once or twice a week, we try not to make to many updates in such a short period of time so players can enjoy the game without being kicked off every day. We don't need to switch the server on and off to test updates either, we have a complete Beta testing world for specially chosen players to come and test! [/center]

item.title: WorldScape - Epic Multiversion 317/508 Server!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:100, topic:445277”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=547956.msg4334556#msg4334556 date=1374150063]

That’s pretty cool how you did it, how did it work out overall, such as an animation is does which does not support the lower version?

I’d assume using the update server, if there is an unrecognized item/animation the update server will download it.

edit: the extra animations are loaded through their own custom format (animations.agf)
[/quote]

The 317 client loads 474 Items, Animation, and Gfx. So we just try not to go over that, which works out pretty well. There isn’t much after 474 that people really need or want.

And say there is an animation that is completely different in 508 then it was in 317, we can just tell the 317 client to do animation blah1, and then for someone standing on 508 it does animation blah2.[/quote]

^ this

and yes it is still online, I checked it out yesterday. I don’t usually play servers but I played for a good five hours.

Read full topic

item.title: WorldScape - Epic Multiversion 317/508 Server!
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:99, topic:445277”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=547956.msg4334554#msg4334554 date=1374149749]
That’s pretty cool how you did it, how did it work out overall, such as an animation is does which does not support the lower version?
[/quote]

I’d assume using the update server, if there is an unrecognized item/animation the update server will download it.

edit: the extra animations are loaded through their own custom format (animations.agf)[/quote]

The 317 client loads 474 Items, Animation, and Gfx. So we just try not to go over that, which works out pretty well. There isn’t much after 474 that people really need or want.

And say there is an animation that is completely different in 508 then it was in 317, we can just tell the 317 client to do animation blah1, and then for someone standing on 508 it does animation blah2.

Read full topic

item.title: WorldScape - Epic Multiversion 317/508 Server!

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Arcik:

That’s pretty cool how you did it, how did it work out overall, such as an animation is does which does not support the lower version?

I’d assume using the update server, if there is an unrecognized item/animation the update server will download it.

edit: the extra animations are loaded through their own custom format (animations.agf)
